scripts.test: npm run karma && npm run eslint
scripts.browser-spec: npm run browser-spec-build && npm run browser-spec-start
scripts.apidoc: laxar-dox -d docs/api/ --naming-style-package --modules-from-directory lib/ && laxar-dox -d docs/api/ --naming-style-package laxar-uikit.js
scripts.dist: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack && npm run styles-scss && npm run apidoc
scripts.styles-scss: npm run sass themes/default.theme/scss/theme.scss && npm run postcss themes/default.theme/css/theme.css
scripts.styles-test: npm run sass themes/default.theme/scss/test.scss && rm themes/default.theme/css/test.css themes/default.theme/css/test.css.map
scripts.sass: node-sass --precision 10 --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents --include-path themes/default.theme/scss/ --include-path scss/ --include-path node_modules/bootstrap-sass/assets/stylesheets/ --include-path node_modules/ --output themes/default.theme/css/
